text: @NYGovCuomo Coming from the guy who sent all the #coronavirus positive patients to nursing homes....#Cuomo is an idiot, #Deblasio is an even bigger idiot & #Barbot failed horribly as the city’s top doctor.  They all need to answer for their crimes!! NYers needs to hold them accountable.
